title: Strengthening System Design Practical Competencies: Cultivating Multicultural Capabilities in Science via Virtual Global Partnerships

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Scientific Knowledge and Experience Using Online Collaboration Tools
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners collaborate with peers from diverse cultural backgrounds to achieve science project objectives at least 80%
Learners apply three or more communication strategies that recognize and respect cultural differences in virtual environments
Learners write a report analyzing conflict situations arising within multicultural teams and proposing resolution strategies

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
